verses.plain: Surely there is a vein for the silver, and a place for gold where they fine it.

tokens.t: Surely there is a vein for the silver, and a place for gold
they fine

verses.plain: Iron is taken out of the earth, and brass is molten out of the stone.

tokens.t: Iron is taken out of the earth, and brass
molten
the stone.

verses.plain: He setteth an end to darkness, and searcheth out all perfection: the stones of darkness, and the shadow of death.

tokens.t: He setteth an end to darkness, and searcheth out all perfection: the stones of darkness, and the shadow of death.

verses.plain: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant; even the waters forgotten of the foot: they are dried up, they are gone away from men.

tokens.t: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant;
forgotten of the foot: they are dried up, they are gone away from men.

verses.plain: As for the earth, out of it cometh bread: and under it is turned up as it were fire.

tokens.t: the earth, out of it cometh bread: and under it is turned up as it were fire.

verses.plain: The stones of it are the place of sapphires: and it hath dust of gold.

tokens.t: The stones of it
the place of sapphires: and it hath dust of gold.

verses.plain: There is a path which no fowl knoweth, and which the vulture’s eye hath not seen:

tokens.t: a path which no fowl knoweth, and which the vulture’s eye hath not seen:

verses.plain: The lion’s whelps have not trodden it, nor the fierce lion passed by it.

tokens.t: The lion’s whelps have not trodden it, nor the fierce lion passed by it.

verses.plain: He putteth forth his hand upon the rock; he overturneth the mountains by the roots.

tokens.t: He putteth forth his hand upon the rock; he overturneth the mountains by the roots.

verses.plain: He cutteth out rivers among the rocks; and his eye seeth every precious thing.

tokens.t: He cutteth out rivers among the rocks; and his eye seeth every precious thing.

verses.plain: He bindeth the floods from overflowing; and the thing that is hid bringeth he forth to light.

tokens.t: He bindeth the floods from overflowing; and
hid bringeth he forth to light.

verses.plain: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?

tokens.t: But where shall wisdom be found? and where
the place of understanding?

verses.plain: Man knoweth not the price thereof; neither is it found in the land of the living.

tokens.t: Man knoweth not the price thereof; neither is it found in the land of the living.

verses.plain: The depth saith, It is not in me: and the sea saith, It is not with me.

tokens.t: The depth saith, It
not in me: and the sea saith,
not with me.

verses.plain: It cannot be gotten for gold, neither shall silver be weighed for the price thereof.

tokens.t: It cannot be gotten for gold, neither shall silver be weighed
the price thereof.

verses.plain: It cannot be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the precious onyx, or the sapphire.

tokens.t: It cannot be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the precious onyx, or the sapphire.

verses.plain: The gold and the crystal cannot equal it: and the exchange of it shall not be for jewels of fine gold.

tokens.t: The gold and the crystal cannot equal it: and the exchange of it
jewels of fine gold.

verses.plain: No mention shall be made of coral, or of pearls: for the price of wisdom is above rubies.

tokens.t: No mention shall be made of coral, or of pearls: for the price of wisdom
above rubies.

verses.plain: The topaz of Ethiopia shall not equal it, neither shall it be valued with pure gold.

tokens.t: The topaz of Ethiopia shall not equal it, neither shall it be valued with pure gold.

verses.plain: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where is the place of understanding?

tokens.t: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where
the place of understanding?

verses.plain: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living, and kept close from the fowls of the air.

tokens.t: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living, and kept close from the fowls of the air.

verses.plain: Destruction and death say, We have heard the fame thereof with our ears.

tokens.t: Destruction and death say, We have heard the fame thereof with our ears.

verses.plain: God understandeth the way thereof, and he knoweth the place thereof.

tokens.t: God understandeth the way thereof, and he knoweth the place thereof.

verses.plain: For he looketh to the ends of the earth, and seeth under the whole heaven;

tokens.t: For he looketh to the ends of the earth,
seeth under the whole heaven;

verses.plain: To make the weight for the winds; and he weigheth the waters by measure.

tokens.t: To make the weight for the winds; and he weigheth the waters by measure.

verses.plain: When he made a decree for the rain, and a way for the lightning of the thunder:

tokens.t: When he made a decree for the rain, and a way for the lightning of the thunder:

verses.plain: Then did he see it, and declare it; he prepared it, yea, and searched it out.

tokens.t: Then did he see it, and declare it; he prepared it, yea, and searched it out.

verses.plain: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.

tokens.t: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that
wisdom; and to depart from evil
understanding.

footnotes.text: It…: Heb. Fine gold shall not be given for it
